messages:
Name: Ederson
Nationality: Brazil
Date of Birth: August 17, 1993
Position: Goalkeeper
Current club: Manchester City
Premier League clubs played for: Manchester City
Goalkeeper Ederson plays for Manchester City and wasn't involved in any of the three Premier League games that his side have played so far in 2025/2026.
Ederson last made an appearance in competition action on May 25, 2025, playing 90 minutes for Manchester City against Fulham and keeping a clean sheet in their 2-0 win.
In the team's next Premier League game on September 14, Manchester City face a home match against Manchester United.
Ederson played 26 Premier League games last season for Manchester City, keeping a total of 10 clean sheets, while also providing four assists.
Before linking up with Manchester City in July 2017, Ederson made 37 league appearances in total at Benfica, providing one assist.

Ederson first played in Premier League action for Manchester City on August 12, 2017 as a starter against Brighton & Hove Albion at the age of 23 years and five days. He has appeared 276 times overall in the competition, keeping 122 clean sheets.
